Subject: Fw: Employee Goals & Goal Audit Review
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Hagop,

Hope all is well.

Based on the evaluation from the Talent Management team, please note there are a few goals that have been identified as poor (highlighted) while the rest are all fine in terms of quality rating . Could I request you to update them now that the system is open until 31 August.

What is required is to update the goals' statement to be more meaningful, impactful and measurable.

Subject: Employee Goals & Goal Audit Review
 

Dear Sabitha,

Hope you are doing well.

Please find attached the employee goals along with the corresponding goal audit details for your review & necessary action.

In the file:

*	Column ‘H’ indicates the overall Goal Quality rating
*	Column ‘I’ highlight the missing SMART components (if any)

Note: This audit was conducted using an AI-based methodology to enable faster and broader coverage. While it significantly accelerates the review process, please be aware that minor inconsistencies may occur, and the results may not reflect 100% accuracy.

 

Should you have any questions or require further clarification, feel free to reach out.

 

Regards

Sujay Dsilva

From: Emma Elkarout <Emma.Elkarout@chalhoub.com>
Sent: Monday, June 23, 2025 6:19 PM
To: People Team <PeopleTeam@chalhoub.com>; Sujay Dsilva <Sujay.Dsilva@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Samer Touma <Samer.Touma@chalhoub.com>; Dania El Kheyami <Dania.Elkheyami@chalhoub.com>; Sara Hegazi <Sara.Hegazi@chalhoub.com>; Claire D'Agostino Hamdy <Claire.DAgostino@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Goal Audit Report_2025

 

Dear All,

As we go through the mid-year review conversations, and as discussed with most of you, our primary focus in 2025 remains to enhance the quality of goals to drive business outcomes.

 

To this effect, we conducted a Goal Quality Audit (similar to last year) and attached is the 2025 Group Goal Audit Report for your action.

 

This year, we leveraged AI to conduct a full Goal audit on all 14,666 goals set by all employees eligible for Goal setting (2,237) – whereas, last year we were able to conduct this Goal Audit for only 20% sample of the Goals.

metadata.doc_id: CSVZOI8 - employee goals & goal audit review\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CSVZOI8 - employee goals & goal audit review\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
This year, we leveraged AI to conduct a full Goal audit on all 14,666 goals set by all employees eligible for Goal setting (2,237) – whereas, last year we were able to conduct this Goal Audit for only 20% sample of the Goals.

 

*	The overall Group Goal Quality Score stands at 84%, a 2% increase over 2024. The 2% increase is significant considering last year only 20% of the goals were audited vs 100% this year.

 

*	Vertical | Individual - specific goal audit details will be shared by @Sujay Dsilva <mailto:Sujay.Dsilva@chalhoub.com>  with the respective People Partners for appropriate follow-up and action with the teams. You can alert team members with low quality goals to review and amend their goals.

 

What’s Next:

*	Goals are now unlocked on DRIVE until August 31, 2025. Email notifications have been sent to employees and Line Managers.
*	Encourage Line Managers to conduct mid-year check-ins with their respective teams to review and strengthen their goals to better align with SMART criteria.
*	New joiners may also proceed to set their goals for the 2025 PM cycle.

The Goal Setting Dashboard for 2025 can be viewed HERE <https://app.powerbi.com/links/26GXrSQWFG?ctid=6ef8304c-f37b-42a5-a569-0a7d8249fbf3&pbi_source=linkShare&bookmarkGuid=a2f76039-5c3b-4808-95b4-e02ebdbad406>  for your reference. We look forward to partnering with you through the second half of the cycle and driving continued excellence in performance.

 

R,

Emma

 

 

 

Resources to Support Goal Setting:

This year, we leveraged AI to conduct a full Goal audit on all 14,666 goals set by all employees eligible for Goal setting (2,237) – whereas, last year we were able to conduct this Goal Audit for only 20% sample of the Goals.

 

*	The overall Group Goal Quality Score stands at 84%, a 2% increase over 2024. The 2% increase is significant considering last year only 20% of the goals were audited vs 100% this year.
